meanings.sent1: She was esteeming the kind gesture from her friend.
meanings.sent2: He enjoys esteeming the beauty of nature.
meanings.sent3: The cat was esteeming the empty box as a royal throne.
meanings.sent4: The artist was esteeming the canvas as a blank slate for creativity.
meanings.sent5: The teacher was esteeming the hardworking student's dedication.

meanings.sent1: They were esteeming the rare antique vase in the museum.
meanings.sent2: People often esteem the advice of experienced elders.
meanings.sent3: The robot was esteeming the shiny new gadget with curiosity.
meanings.sent4: She was esteeming the old book as a treasure trove of knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The gardener was esteeming the vibrant colors of the flowers.

meanings.definition: To have a high opinion of
meanings.sent1: He was esteeming the talented musician's performance.
meanings.sent2: She is esteeming the hard work put into the project.
meanings.sent3: The detective was esteeming the cleverness of the criminal's plan.
meanings.sent4: The coach was esteeming the dedication of the team.
meanings.sent5: The judge was esteeming the fairness of the trial.
